QuestData.Title: Orientation: Valdrakken
QuestData.Description:
Welcome to Valdrakken, $p. I am Unatos, Keeper of Renown for the Valdrakken Accord.
In recognition of your assistance to the dragonflights, a number of suppliers around the city have been authorized to supply you with some of our finest wares.
Why not take some time to familiarize yourself with their locations and wares?
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet the important Accord suppliers in Valdrakken.
QuestData.RewardText: On behalf of the Valdrakken Accord, we look forward to working with you, $p.
